Title: New Girl
Plot: Brent decides to take on a new secretary despite the spectre of redundancies in the Slough branch. He can choose between some bloke that's turned up for interview and a pretty young blonde. The day is rounded off with a trip to Chasers nightclub...
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
GuestStars: Kiki Kendrick, Ellen Collier, Robin Ince, Tiffany Stevenson-Oake, Nicola Cotter
